author: Special Correspondent
text:
Those who have already applied for passports for Hajj pilgrimage should contact the Nodal Officer immediately, a press release here has said. The last date for submitting Hajj application forms is February 8. Only those who possess machine-readable passports with validity up to 10 March 2017 will be permitted to apply for Hajj 2016.

For details log on towww.passportindia.gov.inand make an online payment to get prior appointment.Pilgrims whose passports are pending disbursal can contact the Nodal Officer (Haj Pilgrims), at the regional passport office, Coimbatore in person between 9 a.m. and 12.30 p.m.
title: Hajj: apply now for passports
